sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { CubeIcon, TagIcon, ArchiveBoxIcon, BuildingOfficeIcon, MapPinIcon, ClipboardDocumentListIcon, BellIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, CheckCircleIcon, XCircleIcon, TrendingUpIcon, CurrencyDollarIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { PieChart, Pie, Cell, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, AreaChart, Area } from 'recharts'; import apiService from '../services/api'; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const { data: productsData } = useQuery(['products'], () => apiService.products.getProducts()); const { data: categoriesData } = useQuery(['categories'], () => apiService.categories.getCategories()); const { data: inventoryData } = useQuery(['inventory'], () => apiService.inventory.getInventory()); const { data: suppliersData } = useQuery(['suppliers'], () => apiService.suppliers.getSuppliers()); const { data: locationsData } = useQuery(['locations'], () => apiService.locations.getLocations()); const { data: purchaseOrdersData } = useQuery(['purchase-orders'], () => apiService.purchaseOrders.getPurchaseOrders()); const { data: activeAlertsData } = useQuery(['active-alerts'], () => apiService.stockAlerts.getActiveAlerts()); const products = productsData?.data || []; const categories = categoriesData?.data || []; const inventory = inventoryData?.data || []; const suppliers = suppliersData?.data || []; const locations = locationsData?.data || []; const purchaseOrders = purchaseOrdersData?.data || []; const activeAlerts = activeAlertsData || []; const lowStockItems = inventory.filter(item => { const product = products.find(p => p.id === item.product_id); return item.quantity > 0 && item.quantity <= (product?.min_stock_level || 0); }); const outOfStockItems = inventory.filter(item => item.quantity === 0); const pendingPOs = purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'pending_approval' || po.status === 'approved' ); const recentPOs = purchaseOrders.slice(0, 5); // Chart data preparation const categoryData = categories.map(category => { const categoryProducts = products.filter(product => product.category_id === category.id); const totalValue = categoryProducts.reduce((sum, product) => { const inventoryItems = inventory.filter(item => item.product_id === product.id); const stockValue = inventoryItems.reduce((itemSum, item) => itemSum + (item.quantity * product.price), 0); return sum + stockValue; }, 0); return { name: category.name, value: totalValue, count: categoryProducts.length, fill: getRandomColor() }; }); const stockStatusData = [ { name: 'In Stock', value: inventory.filter(item => item.quantity > 0).length, fill: '#10B981' }, { name: 'Low Stock', value: lowStockItems.length, fill: '#F59E0B' }, { name: 'Out of Stock', value: outOfStockItems.length, fill: '#EF4444' } ]; const poStatusData = [ { name: 'Draft', value: purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'draft').length, fill: '#6B7280' }, { name: 'Pending', value: purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'pending_approval').length, fill: '#F59E0B' }, { name: 'Approved', value: purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'approved').length, fill: '#3B82F6' }, { name: 'Ordered', value: purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'ordered').length, fill: '#8B5CF6' }, { name: 'Received', value: purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'received').length, fill: '#10B981' }, { name: 'Cancelled', value: purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'cancelled').length, fill: '#EF4444' } ]; const monthlyData = generateMonthlyData(purchaseOrders); const topSuppliersData = generateTopSuppliersData(purchaseOrders, suppliers); const stats = [ { name: 'Total Products', value: products.length, icon: CubeIcon, color: 'bg-blue-500', href: '/products' }, { name: 'Categories', value: categories.length, icon: TagIcon, color: 'bg-green-500', href: '/categories' }, { name: 'Inventory Items', value: inventory.length, icon: ArchiveBoxIcon, color: 'bg-purple-500', href: '/inventory' }, { name: 'Suppliers', value: suppliers.length, icon: BuildingOfficeIcon, color: 'bg-indigo-500', href: '/suppliers' }, { name: 'Locations', value: locations.length, icon: MapPinIcon, color: 'bg-yellow-500', href: '/locations' }, { name: 'Purchase Orders', value: purchaseOrders.length, icon: ClipboardDocumentListIcon, color: 'bg-pink-500', href: '/purchase-orders' } ]; const alerts = [ { name: 'Active Alerts', value: activeAlerts.length, icon: BellIcon, color: 'bg-red-500', href: '/stock-alerts' }, { name: 'Low Stock Items', value: lowStockItems.length, icon: ExclamationTriangleIcon, color: 'bg-yellow-500', href: '/inventory' }, { name: 'Out of Stock', value: outOfStockItems.length, icon: XCircleIcon, color: 'bg-red-600', href: '/inventory' }, { name: 'Pending POs', value: pendingPOs.length, icon: ClipboardDocumentListIcon, color: 'bg-orange-500', href: '/purchase-orders' } ]; return (

Dashboard

Welcome to your Inventory Management System

{/* Main Stats */}
{stats.map((stat) => (
{stat.name}
{stat.value}
))}
{/* Charts Section */}
{/* Stock Status Pie Chart */}

Stock Status Overview

`${name} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {stockStatusData.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* Purchase Order Status Bar Chart */}

Purchase Order Status

{/* Category Value and Monthly Trends */}
{/* Category Value Distribution */}

Category Value Distribution

`${name}: $${value.toFixed(2)}`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {categoryData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} [`$${value.toFixed(2)}`, 'Value']} />
{/* Monthly Purchase Order Trends */}

Monthly Purchase Order Trends

{/* Top Suppliers and Recent Activity */}
{/* Top Suppliers */}

Top Suppliers by Order Volume

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

New Products Added

This month

{products.filter(p => new Date(p.created_at).getMonth() === new Date().getMonth()).length}

Orders Completed

This month

{purchaseOrders.filter(po => po.status === 'received' && new Date(po.created_at).getMonth() === new Date().getMonth()).length}

Low Stock Alerts

Active

{lowStockItems.length}
{/* Alerts Section */}

Alerts & Notifications

{alerts.map((alert) => (

{alert.value}

{alert.name}

{alert.value > 0 && (
{alert.value}
)} ))}
{/* Recent Purchase Orders */}

Recent Purchase Orders

View all
{recentPOs.length > 0 ? ( recentPOs.map((po) => (

{po.po_number}

{po.supplier?.name} ${po.total_amount.toFixed(2)}

{po.status.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase()}
)) ) : (

No recent purchase orders

)}
{/* Low Stock Items */}

Low Stock Items

View all
{lowStockItems.length > 0 ? ( lowStockItems.slice(0, 5).map((item) => { const product = products.find(p => p.id === item.product_id); return (

{product?.name || `Product ID: ${item.product_id}`}

{item.location?.name} Qty: {item.quantity}

); }) ) : (

No low stock items

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Add Product Update Stock Create PO Add Supplier
); }; // Helper functions function getRandomColor() { const colors = [ '#3B82F6', '#10B981', '#F59E0B', '#EF4444', '#8B5CF6', '#06B6D4', '#84CC16', '#F97316', '#EC4899', '#6366F1' ]; return colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)]; } function generateMonthlyData(purchaseOrders: any[]) { const months = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec']; const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); return months.map((month, index) => { const monthOrders = purchaseOrders.filter(po => { const poDate = new Date(po.created_at); return poDate.getFullYear() === currentYear && poDate.getMonth() === index; }); return { month, orders: monthOrders.length, value: monthOrders.reduce((sum, po) => sum + (po.total_amount || 0), 0) }; }); } function generateTopSuppliersData(purchaseOrders: any[], suppliers: any[]) { const supplierOrderCounts = purchaseOrders.reduce((acc, po) => { const supplierId = po.supplier_id; if (supplierId) { acc[supplierId] = (acc[supplierId] || 0) + 1; } return acc; }, {} as Record); return Object.entries(supplierOrderCounts) .map(([supplierId, orders]) => { const supplier = suppliers.find(s => s.id === parseInt(supplierId)); return { name: supplier?.name || `Supplier ${supplierId}`, orders }; }) .sort((a, b) => b.orders - a.orders) .slice(0, 10); } export default Dashboard;
